product_name: Delta Cycle Megarack Ultra Bike Rack - Special Buy
long_description: Able to fit on almost any bike, the rear-mount Delta Cycle Megarack Ultra Bike Rack lets you carry panniers (not included) for commuting and long-distance bike tours. Adjustable legs allow correct installation on almost any bike style. Recommended cargo weight limit of 40 lbs. Special buy.
short_description: Able to fit on almost any bike, the rear-mount Delta Cycle Megarack Ultra Bike Rack lets you carry panniers (not included) for commuting and long-distance bike tours.
